Ointment
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 28 - Spread thinly on the affected skin only

Clobetasol 500microgram / Neomycin 5mg / Nystatin 100,000units/g ointment <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 21557611000001101

Clobetasol propionate 500 microgram per 1 gram

Neomycin sulfate 5 mg per 1 gram

Nystatin 100000 unit per 1 gram

  • 30 gram POM

    NHS indicative price = £64.00

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £64.00

Clobetasol propionate 500 microgram per 1 gram

Neomycin sulfate 5 mg per 1 gram

Nystatin 100000 unit per 1 gram

  • 30 gram POM

    NHS indicative price = £64.00

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £64.00

Clobetasol 500microgram / Neomycin 5mg / Nystatin 100,000units/g ointment <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Essential Generics Ltd)</ph> 18670911000001108

Clobetasol propionate 500 microgram per 1 gram

Neomycin sulfate 5 mg per 1 gram

Nystatin 100000 unit per 1 gram

  • 30 gram POM

    NHS indicative price = £64.00

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £64.00

CLOBETASOL PROPIONATE WITH NEOMYCIN SULFATE AND NYSTATIN
